ingredients.item: ½ tsp caster sugar, to taste
Pinch cayenne or hot chilli powder
Salad leaves and bread to serve (optional)

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Cut the tops from the tomatoes, then scoop out the insides and set aside.Remove any tough green cores, then chop the flesh. Tip into a saucepan, add the garlic and 2 tsp oil, then boil for 10 minutes until thickened and saucy. Season and add sugar to taste.

Heat the couscous according to pack instructions, then stir into the tomato pan. Add most of the basil. Spoon into the tomato shells, leaving enough room for an egg. Spoon the rest of the couscous mix into a small baking dish then sit the tomatoes on top.
